MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00pm due to a faulty electrical equipment at Bryson road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:14pm on Saturday, 17 April 2021
